description: Wicked Trail,  low fifth class step and abseil to return.
directions:
Check Logging Road Access from Gold River as these change.
Take Gold River Road for 2.5km North from Hiway 28 and take right hand turn there.  Drive another 32km to the trailhead.  Stay heading generally NNW until you pass Twaddle Lake then 3.2km NE to trailhead.
title: Victoria Peak
